name: Twisted Machines - Endless Car Survival
description:
Master the wasteland by killing off marauding freaks in their twisted machines. Unleash these monstrous racing machines to bash your way through the hazardous wasteland highway. Avoid endless riders from ramming into you to be victorious.

Collect different twisted machines like Wasteland Roller, Bulldozer, Three Wheeler and more to unleash super moves like Terminator, Head Smasher and Ground’ N’ Pound. Enhance your twisted machines using amazing Boosters to score the best!

Features:

• Simple-to-play, arcade-style visuals, retro music and super-cool sound effects to electrify your game experience.

• Unlock more twisted machines by earning coins and using the prize claw.

• Choose your machine and rocket through different wasteland conditions.

• Shoot at enemy vehicles who seek to destroy you.

This game is completely free to download and play. However, some game items can be purchased with real money within the game. You can restrict in-app purchases in your store’s settings.
